meanings.sent1: The delivery person knocked on the backdoor to drop off the package.
meanings.sent2: The cat sneaked out through the backdoor when no one was looking.
meanings.sent3: The backdoor creaked loudly, surprising the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a backdoor to the world of adventure, waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The backdoor, painted in bright red, stood out against the white wall.

meanings.sent1: The hackers used a backdoor to gain access to the company's confidential information.
meanings.sent2: She discovered a backdoor in the system that allowed her to bypass the security measures.
